word:
Chap. 74 - To W. C. White and wife

                                                        W-82-1890 

                            Battle Creek, Michigan, March 9, 1890 

Dear Willie and Mary: 

Yesterday E. J. Waggoner gave a most powerful discourse. I have heard from many who were present, and their testimony was unanimous that God spoke through him. Elder Smith was present, and, they said, listened attentively.
